artist: Designer: Charles Smyth; Manufacturer: Attributed to Henry C. Hart Manufacturing Co.
description: silver rectangular box with designs on 2 sides around "THE SMYTH X-RAY BANK"; 2 raised x-ray machine-like objects on top of box; small lever on front side
inscription:
Inscriptions and Sticker

on x-ray machine-like object, on left, in relief: [PAT. PENDING]; on x-ray machine-like object, on right, in relief: [TRADE MARK / REC\'D]
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [G 245 2-5-7 / \"Smyth X Ray Bank\" / 78 16000.e 31600 / 2 (inside a circle) 51700 / 72100 AD]
title: "Smyth X-ray Bank" mechanical bank
